snippet.title: 👩 📆 Best Month Ever! An Interactive fiction game set in the '60s is coming soon to PC and consoles!
snippet.description:
👉 WISHLIST AND PLAY THE DEMO: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1684400

After being diagnosed with a terminal illness💀💀💀 Louise is left with one month to live. The clock is ticking for her to raise her son.  But how do you explain that to an 8-year old kid? 

Mitch is picking up things fast - like a duckling. He observes his mother and imitates her behavior - but time is running out. So Louise has to think carefully about making the right decisions and setting an excellent example for Mitch to follow. 

Together, they hit the road to take back the time that was stolen from them and live a life as mother and son in 4 short weeks.

👉https://discord.gg/ap3qYZbT34
👉https://www.fb.com/klabater/
👉https://twitter.com/klabater
